kpi.name: M1022C73

kpi_info.title: FRAME LOSS INDICATIONS SENT DUE TO HW OVERLOAD
kpi_info.use: The number of "Congestion indication control frame - frame loss" sent to BTS due to RNC HW overload. When the RNC Frame Protocol entity sends "Congestion Indication control frame - frame loss" indication to the base station due to RNC HW overload.

kpi.kpi_alias: FRAME LOSS INDICATIONS SENT DUE TO HW OVERLOAD
